name: biters-win
description:
How to play

X key start game
The character moves with the left/right keyboard arrows
Arrow up to jump
Down the button to use the elevator
X key to shoot
C key throwing grenades

Biters. It takes place in the coastal city of Plymouth, a city that is invaded by an ancient vampire clan called the Armenki, below the city is the crypt of the master and leader of the clan called Eventide, which the Armenkis seek to revive by means of a mystical ritual.

A police officer, a resident of the city whose name is unknown (at least at the beginning of the game), runs into this situation, and in his duty to safeguard the welfare of the inhabitants, he meets a person who He tells him that his ancestors fought against that vampire clan and that he has some documents that can help them end that situation and save humanity from such a catastrophe.

Enjoy this great game full of action and adventure.

2D Game platform

Live an intense adventure in pixel art, remembering the classic games of the golden age of 8 and 16 bits, in this platform game that will give you many moments of fun.

Show your skills!

Platform game action 2D, show your skill by completing each of the 7 levels that the game will offer (the game is currently in development and beta) at the moment there is a playable level.

Fight Bosses!

In the city of Plymouth, there will not only be vampires and zombies, at the end of each level you will also face some stronger enemies, who will try to make you fail in your mission.
